positive.explanation: Consultants effectively maintain enrollment momentum through confident guidance and clear action steps
positive.explanation1: Strong demonstration of breaking down complex educational pathways into manageable stages
positive.explanation2: Effective handling of student concerns through immediate practical solutions and clear support

improvement.explanation: Enhanced focus needed on converting positive sentiment into firm commitments with specific dates
improvement.explanation1: Stronger emphasis required on creating concrete enrollment timelines and maintaining momentum
improvement.explanation2: More comprehensive approach needed for addressing life balance concerns with specific solutions

conversations.title: Effective Credit Option Guidance
conversations.consultant_close_attempt: 16 units is only just over $30,000 versus 24 units at $50,000
conversations.student_response: Okay, would it be worth to just use the first method?
conversations.consultant_adaptation: Yes, so once he's got your resume, he'll make sure that we've got absolutely everything that we need
conversations.recommended_improvement: Should have secured commitment after presenting financial benefits

goal_setting.title: Effective Credit Option Guidance
goal_setting.consultant_close_attempt: The consultant provided clear financial comparison but missed opportunity for immediate commitment
goal_setting.student_response: The student showed interest in credit options and cost savings
goal_setting.consultant_adaptation: The consultant provided process information without securing enrollment commitment
goal_setting.recommended_improvement: Should have used financial benefits to secure immediate enrollment commitment
